text: Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online. photo: Country Living/Stacey Brandford I had the most enjoyable time this past week with family and the grandkids staying with Ed and I all week. I didn’t get anything done, but playtime which I enjoyed every minute. Everyone left early this morning so it is just Ed and me in the now quiet house. I plan to spend the day getting the house back in order and then relax with a good book, while in the background Ed will be watching The Masters on TV. Whatever you’re up to today, I hope it’s great! If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here. And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more. html:
Thanks for stopping by for this week’s Style Scouting. My Sunday post where I share the random stuff that captured my attention or inspired me that I found online.

I had the most enjoyable time this past week with family and the grandkids staying with Ed and I all week. I didn’t get anything done, but playtime which I enjoyed every minute.

Everyone left early this morning so it is just Ed and me in the now quiet house. I plan to spend the day getting the house back in order and then relax with a good book, while in the background Ed will be watching The Masters on TV. Whatever you’re up to today, I hope it’s great!

If you enjoy these posts – You can find past Style Scouting posts here.

And… If you’re catching up on blog posts you may have missed, be sure to sign-up to get my newest posts via email to stay up to date with everything that’s happening here on the blog and more.
